headline: AES Weighs AI Safety Push And Takeover Interest As Shares Rally
summary: AES (NYSE:AES) has partnered with Haven Safety AI to roll out an AI native safety platform aimed at improving worker protection in high risk environments. BlackRock’s Global Infrastructure Partners unit and EQT AB are reported to be exploring a potential acquisition of AES, signaling active interest in the company’s ownership structure. NYSE:AES is trading at $16.28, with the shares up 16.3% over the past 30 days and 73.3% over the past year, while longer term 3 year and 5 year returns...
